## i2cReadI2CBlockData() function

This reads `rxBuf.length` bytes from the specified register of the device. The count may be 1-32.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function i2cReadI2CBlockData(handle: number, i2cReg: number, rxBuf: Uint8Array): number;
```

</th><th>

</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

handle


</td><td>

number


</td><td>

The I2C device handle as returned by [i2cOpen()](./lgpio.i2copen.md)


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

i2cReg


</td><td>

number


</td><td>

0-0xFF, the register to read


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

rxBuf


</td><td>

Uint8Array


</td><td>

The buffer to receive the data read from the device


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

number

The number of bytes read from the device
